title: 03. The Second Constitutional Settlement, 23 BCE
description: The powers granted to Augustus in 23 BCE and how they reshaped imperial authority while maintaining Republican appearances.

questions.question: Why was a Second Constitutional Settlement necessary in 23 BCE?
options: Augustus wished to abolish the Senate
Augustus faced political, military, and health crises
The First Settlement had failed completely

questions.question: Which major power was affirmed by the Second Constitutional Settlement?

What powers did tribunicia potestas grant Augustus?
options: The ability to propose and veto laws

questions.question: How did Augustus use tribunician power in practice?

How does Velleius Paterculus describe the effects of Augustus’ powers?
options: The restoration of force to laws and dignity to the Senate
